name: dub
description: Dub is an open-source link management and URL shortening platform. It supports branded links, analytics, workspaces, and API access, offering a privacy-friendly alternative to commercial link management tools.
features: URL Shortening: Create short, branded links with custom domains and memorable aliases for better brand recognition.
Click Analytics: Track detailed click statistics including geographic location, device types, and referrer information.
Custom Domains: Use your own domain names for shortened links to maintain brand consistency and trust.
Workspace Management: Organize links into separate workspaces for different projects, teams, or clients.
QR Code Generation: Automatically generate QR codes for shortened links with customizable styling and branding.
Link Expiration: Set automatic expiration dates for links with optional redirect destinations after expiry.
Password Protection: Secure sensitive links with password requirements before allowing access to destinations.
Bulk Operations: Create, edit, and manage multiple links simultaneously through CSV import and batch processing.
API Integration: Access all functionality through comprehensive REST APIs for automation and application integration.
Team Collaboration: Share workspaces with team members and control access permissions for different user roles.
UTM Parameters: Automatically add tracking parameters to links for better campaign attribution and analytics.
Link Preview: Generate social media previews with custom titles, descriptions, and images for better engagement.
